purpose: To enable developers to easily deploy, manage, and scale AI agents via an API.
principle: Utilizes a RESTful API to interact with and manage AI agents, leveraging frameworks like LangChain for agent orchestration.
reusability: Designed to be API-first, allowing integration with various applications and services through standard REST endpoints.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited features and potential bugs; primarily focused on AI agent management and orchestration.

highlight: Facilitates the deployment and management of AI agents through a unified API interface.
